INSTALL_MSG:
Role notifier notifies people when they get a role in this server, use [p]help to find out more 

 Programed by The Tasty Jaffa
NAME: RoleNotifier
SHORT: DMs a user when they gain a role
DESCRIPTION: This cog - AutoRolenotifier will notify users when they get a role, messages can be customised per role and per sever
